Name: Alternatini
Ingredients: 5 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of cocoa powder rim.
Review: For many, " altern'atini " is a pejorative term for a drink masquerading to be a Martini. Purists will certainly be disproving of this "Martini" but it's not so bad, and at least it contains vodka and vermouth. It's also relatively dry and certainly spirituous.
Nutrition: One serving of Alternatini contains 186 calories
